name: EZNet
description: A chatbot interface for retrieving Meraki network data and analysis with natural language!

MERAKI_API_KEY.description: The API token from the Meraki Dashboard.

CISCOSPARK_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The bot's access token from Cisco Spark. Create a new bot account at https://developer.ciscospark.com/add-bot.html if you do not have one.
